title.rendered: Dr Mimi Gao | Principal Naval Architect (Expert Witness)

content.rendered:
Mimi is a graduate Naval Architect with a PhD degree in computational fluid dynamics. She has a strong background in numerical methods for application in both structural and fluid mechanics. As an author of many articles published in journals and conferences and with one patent filed in four countries, Mimi has worked in both academia and industry, on various projects in China and Singapore.

Discipline: Naval Architecture BSC. Computational Fluid Dynamics PhD.
Specialism: Naval Architecture; Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD); Numerical Methods; Structural and Fluid Mechanics; Motion Analyses, Mooring Analyses; AIS/VDR; Collision/Groundings; Propeller Flow, Expert Evidence; Arbitration & Litigation Support.

Contact

Singapore | +65 9722 0832
